name: BM KissAnime - Project: ABE
description: Bm themes are Black Minimalist themes which aim to "flush away" all the extra crap that clogs up your screen and provide a nice truly dark theme. This theme is made to be used with Kissanime abe: https://userstyles.org/styles/103632/kissanime-com-project-abe
additional_info:
V2.0 - Absorbed Kissanime - Project: ABE as the original author no longer maintains it. Huge round of applause for all the hard work they have done on the style until now. 04/03/2018

V1.0.3 - Covered an updated element 08/16/15

V1.0.2 - Removed video border 05/16/15

V1.0.1 - Redid the buttons and logo images - 05/10/15

V1.0
